attributes.action: Stop the production of the newly designed coins
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Matthew Dents newly designed coins should not be produced and removed from circulation.

Please ensure Britania returns to the 50pence and that the portcullis returns to the one penny. These are both long standing traditions in the UK and should not be destroyed by this government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
